title: Ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Chat with local models from Python scripts or notebooks.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama. Use local LLMs in Node or the browser.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Plug Llama & friends into LangChain chains and agents.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Cookbook showing how to build a ChatGPT-like UI on top of Ollama models using Chainlit.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed open-webui). Manage models & chat in the browser.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that talks to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java client for Ollama. Integrate local LLMs into JVM apps or Android.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot CLI shim that proxies to a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-cli
summary: NPM package giving a tiny interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama’s REST endpoints.

title: ollama-ts
summary: Community TypeScript client with stricter types and RxJS streaming utilities.

title: ollama-py
summary: Lightweight PyPI wrapper for Ollama (distinct from official ollama package).

title: Ollama Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for model recommendations, troubleshooting and showcase projects.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with Blazor sample app.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-made docker-compose stacks for Ollama + Open-WebUI, Nextcloud, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that chats with Ollama models in guild channels or DMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama.
